user.title: Connect to Voltx Inverter
user.description: Enter the Modbus TCP connection details for your Voltx inverter. Each inverter is identified by its host, port and slave ID — you can add multiple inverters by running this flow again.

data_description.host: The IP address or hostname of the inverter (e.g. 192.168.1.100).

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Voltx Inverter
reconfigure.description: Update the connection details for this inverter.

error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to the inverter. Check the host, port and slave ID, then try again.

abort.already_configured: An inverter with the same host, port and slave ID is already configured.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to read registers from the inverter (5 – 3600 s). Default: 30 s.
